alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 01 at 7:39AM EDT until October 01 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 3 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Water levels may approach flood stage in isolated locations today. * WHERE...Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From noon today to 3 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/01 PM 10.5 1.7 0.6 4 None 02/02 AM 10.1 1.3 0.9 4-5 None 02/02 PM 10.6 1.8 0.8 5 None 03/03 AM 9.8 1.0 1.0 3 None 03/03 PM 10.4 1.6 0.9 3 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/01 PM 10.9 1.4 0.7 1 None 02/02 AM 10.5 1.0 1.0 1 None 02/02 PM 11.0 1.5 1.0 1 Minor 03/03 AM 10.1 0.6 1.1 2 None 03/03 PM 10.6 1.1 1.0 2 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
